abstract.t: The DNS Zone Version (ZONEVERSION) extended is a way to get information about the version of a DNS in the backend. For example when a DNSSEC signer for a zone generates a new SOA serial, because it has created new RRSIG records, the original data has not changed, but this is not visible to anyone looking at the zone. This document will make it possible show the zone information which is the base of the presented data.
